items.sentence: At that time, I didn\'t know when Tom would arrive.
Today is a good day for taking a walk on the beach.
Tom and I are planning on going to Boston together.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as fluently as Mary does.
Tom won\'t talk to Mary and she won\'t talk to him.
Tom and Mary need to get up early tomorrow morning.
The gestation period of a rhino is about 16 months.
You\'re the one who saved Tom\'s life, aren\'t you?
I didn\'t know Tom was so good at playing the oboe.
Mary was Tom\'s girlfriend all through high school.
You\'re not going to get in trouble for helping me.
We must take measures to prevent traffic accidents.
We need to find out what time Tom will be arriving.
Tom thought Mary knew who to turn the report in to.
Tom thought Mary might like to stay for a few days.
Tom thought it would be a good idea if we did that.
I wonder why Tom told me I didn\'t need to do that.
I beg your pardon. I didn\'t quite catch your name.
I would\'ve come to Boston with you if I could\'ve.
Tom wondered how soon Mary would have dinner ready.
